given_title: Enterprise Architect - Use Case Model
resolved_title: The Use Case Model
excerpt: A Use Case Model describes the proposed functionality of a new system. A Use Case represents a discrete unit of interaction between a user (human or machine) and the system. This interaction is a single unit of meaningful work, such as Create Account or View Account Details.
